title: Bolt Power Bank B102 High-Capacity Portable Charger Designed To Keep Your Devices Powered Up On The Go 10'000mAh Battery
description:
Description
The Bolt Power Bank B102 is a high-capacity portable charger designed to keep your devices powered up on the go. With its robust 10,000mAh battery, you can charge your smartphones, tablets, and other gadgets multiple times without worrying about running out of power.

Key Features:
- Multiple Charging Options: Comes with 4 attached charging cables, including USB-C, Lightning, and Micro USB, making it compatible with a wide range of devices.

- Fast Charging: Supports 12W fast charging output, allowing you to quickly top up your devices.

- LED Indicator: Displays the remaining battery life, so you always know when it's time to recharge.

- Safety Features: Includes overcharge protection, short circuit prevention, and temperature control to ensure safe and reliable charging.

- Compact Design: Lightweight and compact body makes it easy to carry in your bag or pocket.

Specifications:

- Capacity: 10,000mAh

- Input: Micro USB (DC 5V/2.0A) and Type-C (DC 5V/2.0A)

- Output: 2 USB ports (5V/2.4A, 12W Max each) and 1 Type-C port

- Weight: Not specified, but designed to be compact and lightweight

Overall, the Bolt Power Bank B102 is a reliable and versatile portable charger that's perfect for daily use, travel, or emergencies
